00021 #ifndef _RTAI_ASM_I386_LXRT_H
00022 #define _RTAI_ASM_I386_LXRT_H
00023 
00024 #include <asm/segment.h>
00025 #include <asm/rtai_vectors.h>
00026 
00027 #define LOW  0
00028 #define HIGH 1
00029 
00030 union rtai_lxrt_t {
00031 
00032     RTIME rt;
00033     int i[2];
00034     void *v[2];
00035 };
00036 
00037 #ifdef __cplusplus
00038 extern "C" {
00039 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00040 
00041 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00042 
00043 static inline void RTAI_LXRT_TASK_SWITCH (struct task_struct *prev,
00044                                           struct task_struct *next,
00045                                           int cpuid)
00046 {
00047     rthal.switch_mem(prev,next,cpuid);
00048 
00049     __asm__ __volatile__(                                               \
00050                  "pushl %%esi\n\t"                                      \
00051                  "pushl %%edi\n\t"                                      \
00052                  "pushl %%ebp\n\t"                                      \
00053                  "movl %%esp,%0\n\t"    /* save ESP */          \
00054                  "movl %3,%%esp\n\t"    /* restore ESP */               \
00055                  "movl $1f,%1\n\t"      /* save EIP */          \
00056                  "pushl %4\n\t"         /* restore EIP */               \
00057                  "jmp *"SYMBOL_NAME_STR(rthal + 4)"\n"                  \
00058                  "1:\t"                                                 \
00059                  "popl %%ebp\n\t"                                       \
00060                  "popl %%edi\n\t"                                       \
00061                  "popl %%esi\n\t"                                       \
00062                  :"=m" (prev->thread.esp),"=m" (prev->thread.eip),      \
00063                   "=b" (prev)                                           \
00064                  :"m" (next->thread.esp),"m" (next->thread.eip),        \
00065                   "a" (prev), "d" (next),                               \
00066                   "b" (prev));                                          \
00067 }
00068 
00069 #define RTAI_LXRT_HANDLER rtai_lxrt_handler
00070 
00071 #define DEFINE_LXRT_HANDLER() \
00072 asmlinkage long long rtai_lxrt_invoke(unsigned int lxsrq, void *arg); \
00073 asmlinkage int rtai_lxrt_fastpath(void); \
00074 asmlinkage void RTAI_LXRT_HANDLER(void); \
00075 __asm__( \
00076         "\n" __ALIGN_STR"\n\t" \
00077         SYMBOL_NAME_STR(rtai_lxrt_handler) ":\n\t" \
00078         "cld\n\t" \
00079         "pushl $0\n\t" \
00080         "pushl %es\n\t" \
00081         "pushl %ds\n\t" \
00082         "pushl %eax\n\t" \
00083         "pushl %ebp\n\t" \
00084         "pushl %edi\n\t" \
00085         "pushl %esi\n\t" \
00086         "pushl %edx\n\t" \
00087         "pushl %ecx\n\t" \
00088         "pushl %ebx\n\t" \
00089         "movl $" STR(__KERNEL_DS) ",%ebx\n\t" \
00090         "mov %bx,%ds\n\t" \
00091         "mov %bx,%es\n\t" \
00092         "pushl %edx\n\t" \
00093         "pushl %eax\n\t" \
00094         "call "SYMBOL_NAME_STR(rtai_lxrt_invoke)"\n\t" \
00095         "addl $8,%esp;\n\t" \
00096         "movl %edx,8(%esp);\n\t" \
00097         "movl %eax,24(%esp);\n\t" \
00098         "call "SYMBOL_NAME_STR(rtai_lxrt_fastpath)"\n\t" \
00099         "testl %eax,%eax;\n\t" \
00100         "jz 1f\n\t" \
00101         "popl %ebx\n\t" \
00102         "popl %ecx\n\t" \
00103         "popl %edx\n\t" \
00104         "popl %esi\n\t" \
00105         "popl %edi\n\t" \
00106         "popl %ebp\n\t" \
00107         "popl %eax\n\t" \
00108         "popl %ds\n\t" \
00109         "popl %es\n\t" \
00110         "addl $4,%esp\n\t" \
00111         "iret\n\t" \
00112     "1:  call *" SYMBOL_NAME_STR(rthal + 16) "\n\t" /* local_irq_enable() */  \
00113         "jmp *" SYMBOL_NAME_STR(rthal) /* ret_from_intr */ )
00114 
00115 #define LXRT_LINUX_SYSCALL_TRAP lxrt_linux_syscall_handler
00116 
00117 #define DEFINE_LXRT_SYSCALL_HANDLER() \
00118 asmlinkage void LXRT_LINUX_SYSCALL_TRAP(void); \
00119 __asm__( \
00120         "\n" __ALIGN_STR"\n\t" \
00121         SYMBOL_NAME_STR(lxrt_linux_syscall_handler) ":\n\t"     \
00122          "cld\n\t"                              \
00123          "push $0\n\t"                          \
00124          "pushl %es\n\t"                        \
00125          "pushl %ds\n\t"                        \
00126          "pushl %ebp\n\t"                       \
00127          "pushl %edi\n\t"                       \
00128          "pushl %esi\n\t"                       \
00129          "pushl %ecx\n\t"                       \
00130          "pushl %ebx\n\t"                       \
00131          "pushl %edx\n\t"                       \
00132          "pushl %eax\n\t"                       \
00133          "movl $" STR(__KERNEL_DS) ",%ebx\n\t"  \
00134          "mov %bx,%ds\n\t"                                              \
00135          "mov %bx,%es\n\t"                                              \
00136          "movl " SYMBOL_NAME_STR(linux_syscall_handler) ",%ebx\n\t"     \
00137          "movl %ebx,36(%esp)\n\t"                                       \
00138          "call " SYMBOL_NAME_STR(rtai_inhrtp) "\n\t"                    \
00139          "testl %eax,%eax\n\t"                                          \
00140          "popl %eax\n\t"                                                \
00141          "popl %edx\n\t"                                                \
00142          "popl %ebx\n\t"                                                \
00143          "popl %ecx\n\t"                                                \
00144          "popl %esi\n\t"                                                \
00145          "popl %edi\n\t"                                                \
00146          "popl %ebp\n\t"                                                \
00147          "popl %ds\n\t"                                                 \
00148          "popl %es\n\t"                                                 \
00149          "jz 1f\n\t"                                                    \
00150          "addl $4,%esp\n\t"                                             \
00151          "movl $-38,%eax\n\t"   /* return -ENOSYS */                    \
00152          "iret\n\t"                                                     \
00153       "1: ret\n\t")
00154 
00155 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00156 
00157 static union rtai_lxrt_t _rtai_lxrt(int srq, void *arg)
00158 {
00159         union rtai_lxrt_t retval;
00160         RTAI_DO_TRAP(RTAI_LXRT_VECTOR,retval,srq,arg);
00161         return retval;
00162 }
00163 
00164 static inline int my_cs(void)
00165 {
00166         int reg; __asm__("movl %%cs,%%eax " : "=a" (reg) : ); return reg;
00167 }
00168 
00169 static inline void memxcpy(void *dst, int dseg, void *src, int sseg, int longs)
00170 {
00171         // Generalised memxcpy
00172         __asm__ __volatile__ (\
00173         "cld; pushl %%ds; pushl %%es;\n\t"\
00174         "movl %%edx,%%es; movl %%eax,%%ds; rep; movsl;\n\t"\
00175         "popl %%es; popl %%ds;\n\t"\
00176     :/*empty*/: "D" (dst),"S" (src),"c" (longs),"a" (sseg),"d" (dseg));
00177 }
00178 
00179 static inline void _memxcpy(void *dst, void *src, int srcseg, int longsize)
00180 {
00181         __asm__ __volatile__ (\
00182         "cld;pushl %%ds;movl %%eax,%%ds;rep;movsl;popl %%ds;\n\t"\
00183     :/*empty*/: "D" (dst), "S" (src), "c" (longsize), "a" (srcseg));
00184 } // Choice of registers limited by liblxrt gcc -fPIC option.
00185 
00186 static inline union rtai_lxrt_t rtai_lxrt(short int dynx, short int lsize, int srq, void *arg)
00187 {
00188         int __args[12]; void *pt;
00189         lsize /= sizeof(int);
00190         if(my_cs() == __KERNEL_CS) {
00191                 // With this we can reenter lxrt from a kernel space function.
00192                 _memxcpy( &__args, arg, __KERNEL_DS, lsize);
00193                 pt = &__args;
00194         } else pt = arg;
00195 
00196         return _rtai_lxrt((dynx << 28) | ((srq & 0xFFF) << 16) | lsize, pt);
00197 }
00198 
00199 #ifdef __cplusplus
00200 }
00201 #endif /* __cplusplus */
